post.title: fs: mint google nexus one for wind/mobilicity/aws users
post.content: selling my mint condition nexus one (aws version). no scratches/dents on it whatsoever. phone has been rooted and comes with froyo/android 2.2. phone package comes with 4gb microsd card, box, manuals, usb cable, charger and unused earbuds. i'll also include a case-mate gelli case and extra screen protectors. asking for $520 obo (no lowballers), local pickup in downtown toronto. pm for offers. thanks
